Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. This product is not just an item; it's an experience tailored to enhance your daily life. Given its unique features and the effort put into its creation, I believe it would be a valuable addition to yours. I am offering this exclusive opportunity to you for $125. I trust that you will find its benefits worth the investment. Looking forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $125. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $125
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
